briefTitle: A Randomized Controlled Trial of Mandatory Naps for Physicians in Training

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Residents in the University of Pennsylvania Internal Medicine Training Program who are rotating through either Philadelphia VA Medical Center Medical Service or Hospital of University of Pennsylvania Oncology Service

Exclusion Criteria:

* Refusal to consent to participate

outcomeMeasures.title: Hours Slept on Overnight Extended Duty Call Shifts
outcomeMeasures.description: Two sites were separately analyzed for Mean Sleep Time for both Year 1 and Year 2.
